text: The Test de français international (TFI) is a language proficiency test for non-native speakers of French. It is administered by the Educational Testing Service (ETS). ==Format of TFI exam== * is standardized * is multiple choice * contains 180 questions divided into two sections: listening and reading * is composed of six parts (specific instructions are in French) * lasts approximately 2.5 hours (including time for administrative procedures) * measures French proficiency on a single, continuous scale ==External links== * ETS's Canada TFI page * Description of the TFI™ Test Category:French language tests
title: Test de français international
